name: Tiger Tanks VS
description:
RRestartESCBreak Game
Player
LeftRightShoot1ADA+D2Left Arrow
Right Arrow
Left Arrow+Right Arrow
  • Hit the enemy with spikes to destroy their tank, but watch out for their retaliation attack.
  • Bullets stun but do no damage.
  • Hit spikes to change direction or increase the speed.

A simpler port of my first game. It was AGK and now GameMaker. The mobile version is slightly different. It took me about 1/30th the time to remake it. It was very difficult the first time. It made no money. Most downloads came from Korea - I couldnt tell you why - Bless them.
